metadata.title: AWS Systems Manager - Stop Managed EC2 Instances Host Entity Trigger
metadata.description: This playbook can be used by SOC Analysts to stop malicious or compromised EC2 instances in AWS. The playbook can be triggered from a Host entity context in an incident. The playbook takes the Hostname and stops the managed EC2 instances using the Instance ID. The playbook also adds a comment to the incident with instance that was stopped.
prerequisites: 1. Prior to the deployment of this playbook, AWS Systems Manager Custom Connector needs to be deployed under the same subscription.
2. Refer to [AWS Systems Manager Logic App Custom Connector](../../CustomConnector/AWS_SSM_FunctionAppConnector/readme.md) documentation for deployment instructions.
postDeployment: 2. Assign Microsoft Sentinel Responder Role to Playbook.
3. Update Function App Settings with AWS Credentials.
